dialog: Over 100 years ago, Titans suddenly appeared and devoured most of humanity, decimating civilisation.
The survivors built three massive concentric walls to prevent another Titan invasion, and managed a peaceful life inside.
This blue thing must be the ocean.
I wonder if that bird has seen the ocean.
Born inside the Wall, and dying inside it...
Once we find new land, we're free to live anywhere.
Everyone knew that this peaceful life was only a prologue to that sound of despair.
I once saw the end of the world.
It was a bloody, ugly and loud kind of hell.
Where did they come from, and where are they headed?
At the edge of hell, Eren lost Mikasa.
Yet we never abandoned our last strand of hope.
In order to reclaim our farmlands, we must restore the broken Outer Wall.
We detonate this portion to plug that hole.
Even the Scout Regiment was wiped out.
If we fail, it'll be the end of humanity.
Now we have omnidirectional mobility gear!
Humanity decided to confront its doomed future.
Will there be light at the end of darkness?
If the nape is severely damaged, it will perish without regenerating.
We were saved by Captain Shikishima, the Titanslaying hero.
Wouldn't mind a hot Titan chick for once.
And at his side was Mikasa.
I'm just going to kill Titans.
Seeing a completely changed Mikasa, Eren was confused and heartbroken.
Will you be father to my daughter?
I want to defeat the Titans.
The true enemy isn't the Titans, it's safety.
Overwhelmed by the waves of attacking Titans...
I won't let you die here!
Our task is still to kill Titans.
You can't! You're almost out of gas!
Our extinction was only a matter of time.
Revenge will never fill the gaping hole in one's heart.
Like hell he's on our side!
You did that to your own son?
Dear, we already tested on our first child.
I want to identify what triggers explosive cell divisions.
Professor, how did you manage to collect so many books?
We've been purging them for 100 years.
For ages, the world saw no end to wars.
There was a desire to become stronger, richer.
To that end, people built weapons, made scientific advancements and expanded their knowledge.
Do you think that ever led to the end of conflicts?
There were some who said then, "Humanity will unite when a common enemy appears." Over 100 years ago, that common enemy actually appeared.
Faced with extinction, our forefathers built the Walls and trapped themselves inside.
But that turned out to be a blessing.
People preciously shared the limited land, food and resources.
Conflicts disappeared as everyone became equal.
By binding themselves, people found that their hearts became richer.
And by restricting the knowledge and technology at the root of conflict, we managed to secure eternal peace, at last.
But what happens if there's a human who can become a Titan?
I ask you, are you a human? Or a Titan?
Are you a human or a Titan?
Humans don't regenerate limbs that have been ripped off.
Everyone witnessed him become a Titan and then emerge out of the Titan.
He needed to report on how the last explosives were lost, so I sent him back to the Middle Wall.
We saw him annihilate all the Titans in the area.
With all the personnel we've lost, our mission needs to bet on Eren!
Director General, I'm against it, too.
Now I can perform a vivisection! Yes!
Then how do we plug the hole?
Without explosives, there's no way to demolish the Wall.
Chill out, it's a dud bomb.
This belonged to one of your friends, no?
Director General, that belonged to the bomb thief.
The central government has known for some time that forces have been plotting against the regime.
The enemy is after our weapons.
And as feared, it turns out that the renegades have infiltrated us.
We must nip evil in the bud before it flowers.
Don't! What will your siblings do if you die?
Are you going to let Eren die?
I've already given my heart to the cause!
No courage to even bet on me!
Born inside these Walls, I thought my life was meaningless!
But now I'm beginning to see what I'm capable of.
So just don't get in my way, please!
That monster tried to devour you.
After some time, the cerebral cortex breaks down, and his consciousness is overtaken by instinct.
Later, his body's cells are assimilated with the Titan's...
I've never seen this! Another one!
With Director General dead, I'm taking command!
He's a precious test subject! Save him!
What was he trying to say?
From Omotemachi here, we'll go to Monzen to get the bomb, then head to the Outer Wall to plug the hole.
You still think we can plug the hole?
And where do we get explosives?
You heard him earlier, there's a bomb in Monzen.
And going with this small group?
I'm going! I came here to plug that hole.
We can't let all those casualties go to waste.
If you can get home alone past all those Titans.
You guys better not slow me down.
Let's hurry before the Titans spot us.
I guess you'll need me to survive.
That bastard probably went home to his Titan buddies.
Then why didn't that Titan eat him?
Why do the birds go on singing when it's the end of the world?
Because they know that the Wall isn't the end of the world.
I came across the Titan that grabbed you.
This is how our world works.
If this wasn't evolution, maybe it was about creating weapons.
But over 100 years ago, it spun out of control, spawning hordes of Titans.
A large number of people became Titans.
No one knew who'd become a Titan.
People began to distrust and then kill one another, selfdestructing.
This place, was once a metropolis.
Those who couldn't become Titans walled themselves in, and were soon split between the few rulers and the many ruled, giving birth to this fine world we now live in.
Apparently there are several rooms like this.
This is where government officials monitor us while surrounded by banned relics of what they consider a shameful past.
"Abandon "what you would protect, then you will be strong." That's what he told me.
Having lost everything, I even abandoned my memories.
Now you're a Grim Reaper to the Titans.
I've got too many things to protect.
There's about eight or nine of them!
I really don't want to die.
Captain Shikishima is your life saver, and your mentor, and is that all?
The Wall falling two years ago was convenient for the government.
They were about to begin scouts.
Correct, people had forgotten the fear of Titans, and their loyalty to the state had waned.
Information, residence, even childbirth was regulated.
And when people tried to go outside the Wall, what happened?
Thus, the people's hatred was directed at the Titans.
But think of how many people died!
Unfortunately, it's true then and now.
Countless workers died in the name of restoring the Wall.
I can't get the sight of those who were eaten by Titans out of my mind.
How long is this going to continue?
Do you think the state's serious about fixing the Wall?
You're saying these expeditions are pointless? Then why?
To instil the fear of Titans across generations.
To ensure no one would ever want to go beyond the Wall.
Then... let's bring it to an end.
Unlike the other cattle, you retain your intellect even as a Titan.
We'll end the days of slavery and create a new world.
Don't betray the hero within you.
It's just you and me doing this?
As an inland guy, you didn't need to.
Nothing I did was ever good enough for my asshole dad.
At least you have a dad.
As long as you have one.
Be alert, we're now entering Titan habitat.
I faked their deaths, and we got the army's explosives.
Four in the distance, headed east.
They're from before the Titan War, secretly stashed here by the state.
They're ineffective against Titans, but they work on people.
It's for the government to aim at people.
Exactly, you are your own master.
By the way, I heard there's still a bomb left.
But how do we get this on the Wall?
We're going to do it together.
Even if he were here, would he even listen to humans?
Isn't that a preTitan War gun?
How'd you get your hands on an MGL?
Good, you saved us the trouble of digging this up.
Hope for our future, I guess?
Oh, one more thing, what's this cargo?
A prewar weapon that can hit even moving targets with precision.
Not only that, it has the power to lead us to victory.
Yes! Oh, wow, there's an RDS...
We will requisition this large bomb.
We must now rise against the government.
Together with the power to change the world, we will return inland.
The Walls we must destroy are there.
But then the Titans will enter.
They'll storm in like an avalanche.
That's the aim! With our weapons and the large bomb you dug up, we will destroy both Inner Walls, allowing the Titans to enter.
When the two Walls fall, we shall rise in revolt, beginning humanity's revolution.
The explosives are for fixing the Outer Wall!
Those are the selfish people you despise.
But they're just normal people, they didn't do anything.
They've been cattle for over 100 years.
Enabling this evil system is criminal enough.
As long as they're around, nothing will change.
Even so, no one deserves to die!
Your own hands were tainted when you killed those Titans.
They were just innocent people, too.
Are you all content with this world?
You have no freedom to know, to live, to bear children!
The enemy is not the Titans.
It's the government, using fear to rule.
With those bombs, we can end this false peace.
Now is the time to decide!
Like I told you, you can only gain by letting go.
Will you be father to my daughter?
There was a guy who abandoned his girl.
Once we find new land, we're free to live anywhere.
I won't let you use the bomb for something like that.
What do you see in this guy?
The Wall, the times, the world...
Don't like it? Turn into a Titan.
Thought you'd be a useful weapon, but I miscalculated.
You don't know anything about me.
You feel pity for your first love.
Don't you touch her with those filthy hands!
Playing with you has gotten boring.
If I press this, this bomb will explode!
If you move, this whole area will blow.
Pity, so it was a lie.
That fool! What will his siblings do?
I can at least destroy the Middle Wall with this.
I'll show you who the truly chosen one is.
This is the correct way to give your heart.
The strongest man as the strongest Titan?
Is this really going to make you a Titan?
I dunno, but I have to do it!
You're not the only one here!
As long as we've kept fighting, we haven't lost!
But he's still only got two arms and two eyes!
Pity, we could've saved the world together.
I need you to put this into the crack up there.
To be safe, I'll only attach this timing device up there.
Push it in here, right here.
Pierce the nape without killing Eren.
Prewar military vehicles sure are sturdy.
I wonder if that bird has seen the ocean.
Don't worry, Armin's on it now.
Sasha, can you hold that side?
OK, it'll detonate in five minutes.
As heroes who restored the Wall, you shall be treated like nobles inland, for life!
But that's only if you hand over your Titan friend and continue to defend the Wall!
Think we'd sell Eren for that?
What in the world could you want?
I want to know the truth about this world!
They would've been happier inside the Wall, not knowing anything!
That's why you were protected by the Wall!
I'd rather be free in Hell than a slave in Heaven!
Outside there's nothing to rely on!
Trying to keep us from plugging the hole.
Give me the ODMG and the gas tank.
Don't you dare touch the bomb!
This is revenge for Jean and for everyone!
Can you hit the bomb with that?
Hit the fuse to trigger it.
Each time we take the Wall down, they'll build it back up.
Just to save their pathetic selves.
I admire your guts, but this prey is mine!
You've got your own future to live.
The Director General is blown to bits.
The first explosion will vaporize the halogen, boron, etc., leading to a second...

Haruma Miura Hiroki Hasegawa Kiko Mizuhara Kanata Hongo Takahiro Miura Nanami Sakuraba Satoru Matsuo Satomi Ishihara Pierre Taki Jun Kunimura ATTACK ON TITAN END OF THE WORLD Executive Producers: Minami Ichikawa  Nobuyasu Suzuki CoExecutive Producer: Akihiro Yamauchi Producer: Yoshihiro Sato Production Supervisors: Takeshi Sato  Shiro Kido Line Producer: Kensei Mori VFX Director: Katsuro Onoue Cinematography: Shoji Ehara Lighting: Takashi Sugimoto Production Design: Tsuyoshi Shimizu Sound Recording: Jun Nakamura  Hironobu Tanaka Music: Shiro Sagisu Based on the manga "Attack on Titan" by Hajime Isayama originally serialised in the monthly Bessatsu Shonen Magazine Screenplay: Yusuke Watanabe  Tomohiro Machiyama Directed by Shinji Higuchi This is a surprise It appears two subjects escaped from the test zone.
It's the unpredictability that keeps it interesting.
